Class Shape

  • java.lang.Object
    • Shape
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    OneDShape, ThreeDShape, TwoDShape

    public abstract class Shape
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Elliot Lohr This program provides a template for a shape object
